entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
